name: StartTimerClickup
description:
Start a timer for the authenticated ClickUp user.

Use this tool to initiate a timer for the authenticated user in ClickUp. It is ideal for tracking time on specific tasks or projects.

parameters.name: workspace_identifier
parameters.description: The Workspace ID required when custom task IDs are used.

parameters.name: timer_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the timer entry. Includes fields like `tid`, `description`, `tags`, and `billable`.

tags.description: Users on the Business Plan and above can include a time tracking label.

value_schema.description: For Workspaces on the Free Forever or Unlimited Plan, either the `timer_id` parameter or the `"tid"` field in the body of the request are required fields.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when `custom_task_ids` is `true`. Required for task referencing.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: For Workspaces on the Free Forever or Unlimited Plan, either the `timer_id` parameter or the `"tid"` field in the body of the request are required fields.

tags.description: Users on the Business Plan and above can include a time tracking label.

value_schema.description: For Workspaces on the Free Forever or Unlimited Plan, either the `timer_id` parameter or the `"tid"` field in the body of the request are required fields.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
